text: Drew Bledsoe (14 February 1972) is a former American football player. He was a quarterback for the New England Patriots, the Buffalo Bills and the Dallas Cowboys. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:New England Patriots players Category:Sportspeople from Washington (state) Category:People from Ellensburg, Washington
title: Drew Bledsoe
